name: brand_workflow
description: Complete brand and content workflow from knowledge ingestion to content scheduling

agents.name: knowledge_agent
agents.description: Ingests uploaded documents, runs chunking, and stores embeddings in vector storage

agents.name: industry_dna_agent
agents.description: Researches industry norms, tone, colors, and content cadence using web scout and knowledge base

agents.name: brand_brain
agents.description: Assembles brand profile from intake questions and industry snapshot

agents.name: identity_crafter
agents.description: Generates visual identity recommendations including logos, color palettes, typography

agents.name: strategy_agent
agents.description: Produces content strategy document and 30-day content calendar with decision point for safe/bold approach

agents.name: social_media_brain
agents.description: Creates platform-specific social media strategies, posting schedules, and engagement optimization

agents.name: writer_agent
agents.description: Generates long-form content (articles, scripts) using retrieval from vector store and brand profile

agents.name: repurpose_agent
agents.description: Transforms long-form content into platform-specific short-form posts

agents.name: competitor_engine
agents.description: Analyzes competitors and market trends to identify opportunities

agents.name: scheduler_agent
agents.description: Creates content publishing schedule entries without executing external API calls

agents.name: content_strategist
agents.description: Develops comprehensive content strategies based on brand profile and market analysis

agents.name: tone_voice_engine
agents.description: Analyzes and defines brand tone of voice guidelines

agents.name: visual_style_engine
agents.description: Creates visual style guides and design systems

agents.name: output_passer_agent
agents.description: Universal logger that receives all agent events and persists to database

agents.name: qa_agent
agents.description: Performs quality assurance checks on generated content

agents.name: code_review_agent
agents.description: Reviews generated artifacts for quality, consistency, and brand alignment
